name: Jessica Hopper
description: I loved my trip to Paris! The best part was climbing the Eiffel Tower, and don't get me started about how amazing the food is!

name: Larry Geary
description: If you are looking for gorgeous scenery without burning a hole in your wallet, Thailand is the place to go! Bartering for goods was such an amazing experience! I got an a amazing massage for only $5!!

name: Sarah Bell
description: Adventure is out there! South Africa was one of my favorite places to visit; the wild coast! You can go on a safari or horse backpacking trip and ride on the most beautiful beaches!
